effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases inversely with happiness, given by `(255 - happiness) * 2 / 5`, to a maximum of 102. Power bottoms out at 1.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases inversely with happiness, given by `(255 - happiness) * 2 / 5`, to a maximum of 102. Power bottoms out at 1.

short_effect.black_white: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.

flavor_text.black_white: A full-power attack that grows more powerful the less the user likes its Trainer.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A full-power attack that grows more powerful the less the user likes its Trainer.
